VtuneApi.h

Go to the documentation of this file.
00001 /*********************************************************************************
00002  * vtuneapi.h 11-05-97
00003  * Intel Corporation
00004  * 
00005  * To use VTune's programatic method to start and stop sampling:
00006  * include this header file with your project when using the VTune pasue/resume APIs,
00007  * then link the vtuneapi.lib file to your module or load the vtuneapi.dll during runtime
00008  *
00009  * When running your application under VTune, if you want to start the session with the 
00010  * sampler paused, make sure the "Start the new session 
00011  * in Pause mode" option is enabled under View Sampling Options/Advanced tab 
00012  *
00013  * The sampler is controlled by a flag. When the flag is set, sampling is stopped. When the 
00014  * flag is reset, sampling is running. If you start VTune without enabling the "Start the 
00015  * new session in Pause mode" option, the flag is reset and the sampler is running. If you 
00016  * start VTune and enable the "Start the new session in Pause mode" option, the flag is set 
00017  * and the sampler is not running. 
00018  *
00019  * To set the flag, call VtPauseSampling(). To rest the flag, call 
00020  * VtResumeSampling().
00021  * 
00022  * Be aware that the flag is global. If one thread pauses sampling, any other thread 
00023  * in the system can resume the sampler.
00024  * 
00025 \*********************************************************************************/
00026 
00027 #ifndef _VTUNEAPI_H_
00028 #define _VTUNEAPI_H_
00029 
00030 #ifdef _VTUNE_PROFILING //Preprocessor directive that is set when using debug, 
00031                                                                         //release with debug info, and boundschecker builds. 
00032                                                                         //(all VTune code vanishes in release builds where this preprocessor directive isn't set)
00033 
00034 #include <windows.h>
00035 
00036 #if !defined(_VTUNEAPI_)
00037 #define VTUNEAPI __declspec(dllimport)
00038 #else
00039 #define VTUNEAPI __declspec(dllexport)
00040 #endif
00041 
00042 
00043 VTUNEAPI 
00044 BOOL VtPauseSampling(void);
00045 
00046 VTUNEAPI 
00047 BOOL VtResumeSampling(void);
00048 
00049 #else
00050 
00051 //Replace all calls with empty statements so release builds don't waste any time!
00052 #define VtPauseSampling()                 
00053 #define VtResumeSampling()          
00054 
00055 #endif  // _VTUNE_PROFILING
00056 
00057 #endif  // _VTUNEAPI_H_
00058
